Description: Number of currently active Google Fiber customers.
Number of new installations completed in the time period.
Calculation / Formula: COUNT(DISTINCT install_job_id) WHERE job_type = 'install' AND job_status = 'completed'

Description: Number of customers who cancelled service in the time period.
Calculation / Formula: COUNT(DISTINCT customer_id) WHERE status = 'churned' AND churn_date IN period

Description: Percentage of active customers who churned in the period.
Data Source Tables: Derived from churned customers + active customers

Description: Total subscription revenue in the selected month.
Average monthly revenue per active customer.
Percentage of time the network is available.
Number of distinct network outages in the period.
Average time from job start to completion for installs.
Percentage of jobs resolved on the first visit.
Number of support tickets created in the period.
Average time from ticket creation to closure.
